item.title: 3d Printing
item.description: Why 3d printing? 3d printing is one of the most important techniques in the lorem ipsum dolor sit You can make things with 3d printers! Making objects stuff projects important information test addition for showcase another test addition from netlifyCMS 3d printers are hot, try not to burn yourself test Resources Some potential resources you might find on the internet:

title: Omni Car Project date: 2022-07-20T00:15:38.963Z description: A cute tank drive car suitable for drifting About Omni Car Project By: MingWei Yeoh It's a tank driven car with omni wheels for some sick drifting without the fear of shredding the floor! Combined with a responsive FLYSKY Drone Transmitter, this makes for a fun project! ![](file://C:\Users\mingw\Documents\Envision Projects\Omni Car\assets\2022-07-23-12-29-43-robotcar.gif?msec=1658604586449?msec=1658722695541) Challenges CAD The main gripe with the included motors in the kit is that they are a little slow.
